main.title: Diamond Hands Utility
main.description: The one stop to make the most of the utility offered by DMNDS for DH holders.

inflation.title: Inflation, Fiat, and the Fed
inflation.description: We have had a lot of questions regarding inflation and monetary policy over the last couple of months, and not many people are aware of the impact and importance of inflation when dealing with financial markets.

layer.title: Layer-2 Ecosystem Update
layer.description: Major activities, outlooks, and updates that are bound to happen throughout the year in the L2 ecosystem can be found in this report. Pure Alpha regarding Arbitrum, Optimism, StarkWare ecosystem, and zkSync.

bear.title: Navigating the Bear Market
bear.description: Bear markets are frantic and frightening, but they are a natural part of the market cycle. Bull markets do not last forever, nor do bear markets. The latter are healthy and required for continued price appreciation.

forex.title: FOREX On-Chain
forex.description: The time has come! We’re finally at the end of the cross-chain communications series. We’ve covered the most feasible methods of closing the gaps that exist between chains - but how can one gain exposure to this upside? We got you covered!

wealth.title: The Bridge to Crypto Wealth
wealth.description: We are rapidly approaching the end of the cross-chain communications series. Up till now, we have covered; the thesis, Liquidity Pools, Synthetic Assets, and Layer 0 protocols.

xchain.title: Sliding into X-Chain DMs
xchain.description: Up till this point we have covered a few of the cross-chain solutions that allow for the transfer of wealth between chains. However, there is one area that we have yet to cover - cross-chain messaging.

universe.title: Multi-Chain Universe & Thesis
universe.description: If you are a true DeFi degen, you will likely have lost track of the number of wallets you have used...

alive.title: 30X: Alive & Well or...?
alive.description: The question is no longer which chain will succeed and render the rest of them obsolete....

teleport.title: Teleport your Coins
teleport.description: How to move assets and information efficiently and safely between otherwise isolated blockchains.

premium.title: Team Choice
premium.description: I mean it says in the title - SHOW ME THE MONEY!!

premia.title: Diamond Hands Premia
premia.description: I’m no sorcerer, but after months of deep research, I’m confident I can leave the crystal ball at home, and still give you some grade-A alpha. - Max

future.title: Diamond Hands Future
future.description: I’m no sorcerer, but after months of deep research, I’m confident I can leave the crystal ball at home, and still give you some grade-A alpha. - Max

alpha.title: Alpha-DAO Proposal #18
alpha.description: The Diamond Hands NFT project is backed by Cryptonary's team of leading industry experts and one of the biggest established communities in the crypto space.

alphaTwenty.title: Alpha-DAO Proposal #20
alphaTwenty.description: The Diamond Hands NFT project is backed by Cryptonary's team of leading industry experts and one of the biggest established communities in the crypto space.

raffle.title: Diamond Hands Raffles
raffle.description: NFT raffles with entries available ONLY in DMNDS! Will you get lucky?

main.pageTitle: Welcome to the Diamond Hands utility page

dialog.title: Important
dialog.description: Please do not leave the article page until you have finished. You have access to the content for 3 hours. To re-access the content you will have to repeat the payment.

successModal.title: Submitted Successfully!
successModal.description: Thank you for your submission! You can check your submission by clicking on

submitModal.title: Check & Submit your answers
submitModal.something: Click off the popup window to return to the crossword.

dialog.message: IF ON MOBILE - TAP THE THREE HORIZONTAL LINES ON THE TOP RIGHT TO MAKE THE SUBMIT APPEAR. To exit the submit menu, click submit and then cancel the transaction. This will return you to the crossword. Please do not leave the page until you have submitted your crossword answers. Unlimited time, 1 entry per wallet. To re-access the game you will have to repeat the payment with a DMND. The clues are separated into Down and Across. Clicking on a specific clue will automatically set you up to enter your answer for that clue.You can submit your answers with the Submit button in the bottom right, which will make a popup appear. Submission is complete when your transaction with your submission is confirmed - a popup will appear when the submission is complete confirming things. The reset button will clear all your answers.

notFound.message: Sorry, this page does not exist
